data.headline: Senior Backend Engineer with Expertise in Enterprise Architecture
data.summary: Seasoned backend engineer with over 15 years of experience in the corporate sector. Skilled in designing and implementing scalable, high-performance systems that power mission-critical applications. Adept at translating business requirements into technical solutions and leading cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.

experience.title: Senior Backend Architect
experience.paragraph: As the Senior Backend Architect at Acme Corporation, I played a pivotal role in designing and implementing the company's next-generation backend infrastructure. I led a team of talented engineers in migrating legacy systems to a microservices-based architecture, leveraging cloud-native technologies to improve scalability, resilience, and performance. I collaborated closely with business stakeholders to understand their evolving requirements and translated them into technical solutions that delivered tangible value. My expertise in enterprise architecture and distributed systems allowed me to optimize the backend ecosystem, ensuring seamless integration and efficient data flows across the organization.

experience.title: Backend Engineering Lead
experience.paragraph: As the Backend Engineering Lead at Global Tech Inc., I was responsible for building and leading a high-performing team of backend developers. I spearheaded the design and implementation of a scalable, fault-tolerant backend infrastructure to support the company's rapidly growing customer base. I introduced Agile practices and DevOps principles to streamline the software development lifecycle, enabling the team to deliver features and enhancements at a faster pace. I also played a key role in mentoring junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the organization.

projects.name: Enterprise Data Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a secure, scalable, and highly available data platform to consolidate and process mission-critical data from various sources across the organization.

projects.name: Microservices Migration
projects.description: Led the migration of a monolithic application to a microservices-based architecture, improving scalability, fault tolerance, and developer productivity.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Étienne is a middle-aged man with short dark hair and a neatly trimmed beard, wearing a navy blue suit and a white shirt. He has a friendly, confident expression and is looking directly at the camera.
